values.value: Safety glasses required when cutting or drilling, when flying particle hazards exist. Goggles required for airborne dusts or particles that may enter the eye from around safety glasses. Face shields required when grinding or other operations that create the potential for facial injury. Proper shaded goggles or helmets for welding or cutting. ANSI Z87.1 compliant devices. CFR 1910.133, ANSI Z87.1
Are safety glasses and face protection being used as required?
